frontmatter.title: Animations vs transitions what's the difference?
frontmatter.description: “In this post I dive deep into a topic more about semantics than the feature, Viz Animations has landed in the 2020.1 beta and I'd like to make a case about why that's not the correct term for what we've been shown so far.“

frontmatter.title: What’s new in Tableau Desktop 2019.3
frontmatter.description: “In this post I round up the new features in Tableau Desktop 2019.3 with 6 short videos covering each feature. Parameter actions, Italian localisation, local coordinate systems, explain data, parameter action enhancements and distance calculations.“

frontmatter.title: Setting up Tableau Scout
frontmatter.description: Tableau scout is a neat utility that makes it easy to do some user acceptance testing on Tableau workbooks on Tableau server. In this post i walk through the setup process.
